title: Is Google Play Music going away soon in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, With the introduction and regular downloads of apps like Saavn, Spotify etc. Use of Google Play music has reduced. Moreover nowadays people are moving towards apps like poweramp, that provides much good user interface, supports all audio files etc. Which looks rich and have good customizations etc. If you are looking for an simple audio player. Check out poweramp on playstore. Hope it helps.

Google Play Music will end functioning for customers in India and many different markets round the world beginning October, the employer has announced. ... Additionally, Google has introduced that Google Play Music customers will no longer be in a position to circulate from or use the Google Play Music app in the coming months.
